title: A Line
caption: Generative sketch: The journey of a line
description: Geometric shapes made up of fine lines in yellow, orange and pink.

title: Atom to Orbit
caption: WebXR exploration with BBC UX&D and VR Hub
description: Low poly 3D model of Earth against a lilac-blue background scattered with turquoise particles.

process.contributions: Visual development, protoyping, 3D modelling and animation

title: Contained
description: A glowing pool of blue liquid surrounded by pink flora sits inside a levitating blue head as shadow hands move towards it.

title: CSS Robot
caption: Pure CSS robot
description: A cute robot with big eyes, a big glowing blue face, metal bolts on either side it's neck, and a pink brain exposed.

title: Dead Things
description: Pumpkin person stolling through an autumnal park with a pumkin latte in hand and a moth-eaten scarf waving in the wind. A ghost and their kid laugh and walk in the background.

title: Esoterica: In Dreams
description: A ghostly figure enveloped in red light, falls into the crashing waves below.

title: Interference Patterns
caption: Data sketch using NASA's radio emissons from Earth and Saturn
description: Thin arcs of varying sizes and transparency make up a rippled circular shape

title: Mars
caption: 3D model of Mars using a Digital Elevation Model for topography

title: NHS Tracker
caption: NHS tracker with BBC Visual & Data Journalism
description: Representation of a mobile user interface with postcode search and an overview of a trust's targets. Green ticks show when targets have been met, two large figures compare the trust with England as a whole, and a bar chart is used to show each individual trust against each other.

title: Police Panorama
caption: Tracker for recorded crime Vs charges with BBC Visual & Data Journalism
description: Representation of a mobile user interface with police force search and a bar chart comparing percentage change in recorded crimes and charges.

process.contributions: A unified Design/Development approach with ideation, UI, Data Vis, Illustration, prototyping and programming

title: Poppies
description: Painterly poppies in the summer with the warming glow of the sun beaming down on them.

title: Spring
description: A young girl points her face towards the light as her flower shaped head blooms.
